column5: Studio turned into a room in a quiet neighborhood. Walking distance from the house you can find : -A lot of good places to go eat/grab a drink -Galleria Mall -Public Transportation (as close as 2 blocks) -Multiple Grocery Stores  Useful Information: -Main door has a keypad so you can come in and out as you please. -Parking available. -From the Airport: Uber~$40, Supershuttle~$30, Taxi~$50, Bus~$3. All of the options take approximately 35 minutes except for the bus, which takes 2 hours.
